name: Pink Marmalade 2
description:
Marmalade (collective noun): An obscure term for an equine herd.
Pink Marmalade (noun): What these horsies bleed.

Pink Marmalade 2 is a candy gore twin-stick shooter in which the player fights their way through waves of enemies to chase high scores while only ever being a few hits away from losing it all.

How To:

Aim - Mouse / Left Thumbstick
Fire - Left Mouse Button / Right Trigger
Move - W A S D / Left Thumbstick
Dash - Space / Left Trigger
Return To Menu - Esc

Fill Frenzy Bar To Increase Firing Speed
Some Power Ups Are Only Active When Frenzied
Taking Damage Will Cause Bleeding
Kill Anything To Stop Bleeding
Don't Bleed Out
Collect Blood Bags To Increase Blood Supply

Please note: While Unity's multi platform jazz is usually pretty good, I've only been able to personally test this on Windows computers. I've provided a Mac build of this game, but I can provide no guarantees it will work.
